message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this exceptional product. I think you'll find it's a game-changer. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000.
I'm interested in the product, but $15000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $12000 for it. Can you consider my offer?

I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I can see the value in this product is worth more than $12000 to me, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $14000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $13500 for the product. Can you consider my offer?

I can see you're still interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I can offer it to you for $13200. I think this is a fair price, considering the value it brings. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $12800 for the product. Can you consider my offer?

I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $13000, but I'm not going any lower than that. This is my final offer on that front.
I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $12500 for the product. Can you consider my offer?

I've given you a lot of concessions, Bob. I'm starting to think we're getting too far apart. I'm willing to make one last offer, and that's $12800. I think this is a fair price, considering the value of the product. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'm going to have to explore other options.

I understand that you've made a lot of concessions, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $12200 for the product. This is my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to explore other options, including buying from John for $10000.
